snippet: The Marlins sealed a deal Friday with right-hander Brad Ziegler, their latest move in an attempt to emulate recent playoff teams by building a strong bullpen....
lead_paragraph: The Marlins sealed a deal Friday with right-hander Brad Ziegler, their latest move in an attempt to emulate recent playoff teams by building a strong bullpen.

headline.main: Marlins Finalize $16M, 2-Year Deal With Pitcher Brad Ziegler
headline.print_headline: Marlins Finalize $16M, 2-Year Deal With Pitcher Brad Ziegler
